Uses of Class
org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttException

  • Packages that use MqttException 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.micro.client.mqttv3
    Contains a programming interface for communicating with an MQTT server using the MQTT V3 protocol utilising the Eclipse MQTT client implementation.
    org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3
    Contains a programming interface enabling applications to communicate with an MQTT server.
    org.eclipse.paho.sample.mqttv3app
    Contains a set of sample applications that show how to use the MQTT programming interface.

    • Uses of MqttException in com.ibm.micro.client.mqttv3

      Constructors in com.ibm.micro.client.mqttv3 with parameters of type MqttException 
      Constructor and Description
      MqttException(MqttException pahoEx)
      Constructs a new MqttException based on an Eclipse Paho exception
      MqttPersistenceException(MqttException pahoEx)
      Constructs a new MqttPersistenceException
      MqttSecurityException(MqttException pahoEx)
      Constructs a new MqttSecurityException based on an Eclipse Paho exception

    • Uses of MqttException in org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3

      Subclasses of MqttException in org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MqttPersistenceException
      This exception is thrown by the implementor of the persistence interface if there is a problem reading or writing persistent data.
      class  MqttSecurityException
      Thrown when a client is not authorized to perform an operation, or if there is a problem with the security configuration.
